attributes.action: Retain all UK Freedoms prior 23June 2016 EU Referendum or call 2nd EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
UK PM David Cameron indicated resign and refusing to consider 2nd EU Referendum.

4 million UK citizens have signed second referendum petition. 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131215

Brexit leave campaign claimed UK citizens / business would be better off if they left EU. Citizens would not loose their Freedoms.

Financial sector could be given "preferential treatment" with "Passporting"

All UK Freedoms enjoyed by all before 23June 2016 should remain

Otherwise accept 2nd Referendum
attributes.background:
Vote leave EU resulted citizens / business UK & EU loosing a wide variety of Freedoms enjoyed as being part EU

UK financial institutions seeking special considerations for "Passporting"

UK EU Freedoms should be retained for all. No Special Exceptions granted or Government call 2nd Referendum.

rejection.details:
We think you might want similar action to this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/147061
